<title level="1" pfs="">[Kolo Harvan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2486)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Kolo Harvan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2486)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 17</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Halfling](/Languages.aspx?ID=7)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +8, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[daggers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (5), _[standard skeleton key](/Equipment.aspx?ID=266)_, [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 30

**Scurry** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature ends its movement adjacent to Kolo; **Effect** Kolo Steps.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Upward Stab**   Kolo's melee Strikes deal an extra 1d6 precision damage to Medium or larger creatures

</column>
name: Kolo Harvan
